content_en:
07 Jul 2025 18:00 CEST

JACQUET METALS

Regulatory News:

JACQUET METALS SA (Paris:JCQ):

Date

Number of shares constituting the capital

Number of theoretical voting rights

June 30, 2025

21,531,967

31,283,368

The total number of exercisable voting rights attached to these 21,531,967 shares amounts to 30,089,472 voting rights, taking into account the 1,193,896 shares held in treasury by JACQUET METALS SA and deprived of voting rights under Articles L.225-111 and L.225-210 of the Commercial Code.

The variation in the total number of shares constituting the capital compared to the previous monthly statement results from the decision of the Board of Directors, which, during its meeting on June 27, 2025, and in accordance with the delegation granted to it by the General Assembly on June 27, 2025, cancelled, effective June 30, 2025, 484,500 shares bought back for cancellation as part of the share buyback program.
